law.text: It is the intent of KRS 260.660 to 260.665 to serve the public interest by creating a Kentucky Milk Commission within the Department of Agriculture. The purpose of the commission shall be to provide oversight in working to stabilize and improve the dairy industry in Kentucky from production to processing and distribution, and to ensure that Kentucky consumers have an adequate supply of fresh wholesome milk and dairy products.
law.history: Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 67, sec. 1, effective June 25, 2009.
